entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Gaspé
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:36 AM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -2.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gaspé Airport 12:00 PM EST Sunday 05 March 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -2.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 41 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -13.6°C
Wind: WNW 26 km/h gust 49 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning this afternoon. Blowing snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 in Forillon Park. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 cm except 10 cm in Forillon Park. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 in Forillon Park. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm except 5 cm in Forillon Park. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 05 March 2023
